mañcadāyaka： mañcadāyaka（pu）
မဉ္စဒါယက（ပု）
[mañca+dāyaka]
[မဉ္စ+ဒါယက]

Mañcadāyaka：1．Mañcadāyaka Thera． An arahant．In the time of Siddhattha Buddha he was a Candāla，and made a lintel which he offered to the Order．He was fifty times king of the gods and eighty times king of men．Ap．ii．377f．

2．Mañcadāyaka． An arahant Thera．Ninety one kappas ago he gave a bed to Vipassī Buddha （Ap．ii．455）．He is probably identical with Sāmaññakāni Thera （ThagA．i．99）．v．l．Pecchadāyaka．

mañcadāyaka：မဉ္စဒါယက（ပု）
[မဉ္စ+ဒါယက]
ညောင်စောင်းကို-ပေး-လှူ-တတ်သူ၊ မဉ္စဒါယကမထေရ်။
